headline: Eaton Spin Offs Mobility Group To Sharpen Electrical And Aerospace Focus
summary: Eaton (NYSE:ETN) plans to spin off its Vehicle and eMobility segments, together called the Mobility Group, into a separate public company. The new company is expected to be listed by Q1 2027, pending approvals and customary conditions. The separation is intended to sharpen Eaton's focus on its electrical and aerospace businesses. Management is positioning the move as a way to tailor capital allocation and growth strategies for each business. Eaton is best known for its electrical equipment...
